card.name: Kiku Matsuri
card.property: Action: During a conflict at this province, choose a participating character controlled by each player - honor each of those characters.

card.name: Illustrious Forge
card.property: Reaction: After this province is revealed - search the top 5 cards of your conflict deck for an attachment and put it into play attached to a character you control. Shuffle.

card.name: Midnight Revels
card.property: Reaction: After a conflict is declared against this province, choose a character with the highest printed cost among characters in play - bow that character.

card.name: Temple of the Dragons
card.property: Reaction: After this province is revealed - resolve the contested ring's effects as if you were the attacking player.

card.name: Vassal Fields
card.property: Action: During a conflict at this province - your opponent loses 1 fate.

card.name: Daring Challenger
card.property: While you are less honorable than an opponent, this character gets +1[Military]. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel. Put 1 fate on the duel's winner.

card.name: Yasuki Procurer
card.property: Action: Dishonor this character - reduce the cost of the next attachment or character you play this phase by 1.

card.name: Hida Yakamo
card.property: While you are less honorable than an opponent, this character does not bow as the result of conflict resolution in [Military] conflicts and cannot lose duels. (This character is not the duel's loser, but the opponent's character is still the duel's winner.)

card.name: Heavy Ballista
card.property: Action: During a [Military] conflict in which you are defending, discard a card from your hand and choose a ready attacking character. That character's controller selects one - bow that character, or remove 1 fate from it.

card.name: Ichigenkin Soloist
card.property: Composure - This character cannot be chosen as the target of an opponent's triggered ability. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)

card.name: Courtly Challenger
card.property: After this character wins a duel, honor it. After this character loses a duel, dishonor it. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel - resolve the duel. The controller of the duel's winner draws 2 cards.

card.name: Paragon of Grace
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating on your side alone - your opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. If this character is honored, that card is chosen at random instead. Errata from RRG v9

card.name: Kakita Toshimoko
card.property: Interrupt: When this character would lose a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel against a character your opponent controls of his or her choice - resolve the duel. If this character wins, instead of resolving the conflict as normal, both players count 0 total skill in the conflict. (Return the contested ring to the unclaimed ring pool. The conflict has no winner.)

card.name: Kakita Dōjō
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel – resolve the duel. Until the end of the conflict, the duel's loser cannot trigger its abilities. If the duel's winner is a Duelist, bow the duel's loser as well.

card.name: Kitsuki Counselor
card.property: Composure - This character gets +1[Military] and +1[Political]. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)

card.name: Prudent Challenger
card.property: Courtesy. (When this character leaves play, gain 1 fate.)Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel. Choose an attachment attached to the duel's loser and discard it.

card.name: Tranquil Philosopher
card.property: Action: Choose an unclaimed ring - move 1 fate from that ring to another unclaimed ring. Then, gain 1 honor.

card.name: Mirumoto Hitomi
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel against up to two characters your opponent controls - resolve the duel. For each character that loses the duel, its controller must either dishonor or bow it.

card.name: Mirumoto Dōjō
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel – resolve the duel. Move 1 fate from the duel's loser to its owner's fate pool. If the duel's winner is a Duelist, discard that fate instead.

card.name: Honorable Challenger
card.property: Pride. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel. The duel's winner does not bow as a result of this conflict's resolution.

card.name: Ikoma Orator
card.property: While you are more honorable than an opponent, this character gets +2[Political].

card.name: Student of War
card.property: Composure - This character cannot lose fate or be discarded. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)

card.name: Matsu Tsuko
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is attacking, if you are more honorable than your opponent – reduce the cost of the next card you play this conflict by 2.

card.name: Tactician's Camp
card.property: Each honored character you control gets +1[Military].

card.name: Fire Tensai Acolyte
card.property: This character cannot be declared as an attacker except during [Fire] conflicts.

card.name: Sincere Challenger
card.property: Composure - This character gets +2[Political]. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel - resolve the duel. The duel's winner is immune to events until the end of the the conflict.

card.name: Sage of Gisei Toshi
card.property: Action: During a conflict, if you are more honorable than your opponent, choose a participating character your opponent controls - move this character home. Then, move that character home.

card.name: Isawa Ujina
card.property: Forced Reaction: After the [Void] ring is claimed, choose a character with no fate - remove that character from the game. (Unlimited.)

card.name: Ancestral Shrine
card.property: Action: Return 1 or more rings from your claimed ring pool to the unclaimed ring pool - you gain 1 honor for each ring returned this way.

card.name: Loyal Challenger
card.property: After this character wins a conflict, gain 1 honor. After this character loses a conflict, lose 1 honor. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel - resolve the duel. Treat the printed text box of the duel's loser as if it were blank (except for Traits) until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Midnight Prowler
card.property: Reaction: After this character wins a [Military] conflict - look at the top 2 cards of your opponent's conflict deck. You may discard 1 of those cards

card.name: Social Puppeteer
card.property: Composure - This character must be chosen as a target of an opponent's event, if able. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating - switch honor dials with your opponent until your next honor bid.

card.name: Shosuro Hametsu
card.property: Action: Lose 1 honor – search your conflict deck for a Poison card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle.

card.name: Outskirts Sentry
card.property: Reaction: After a character is moved to the conflict in which this character is participating, choose a participating character - honor that character.

card.name: Honest Challenger
card.property: Composure - This character gets +2[Military]. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel. The controller of the duel's winner moves a character from his or her home area to the conflict.

card.name: Ide Negotiator
card.property: Reaction: After you reveal your honor dial - change the bid on your dial to a value 1 higher or lower than its current value (to a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 5).

card.name: Shiotome Heroine
card.property: Reaction: After an opponent gains 1 or more honor through a card effect - ready this character.

card.name: Utaku Kamoko
card.property: While this character is dishonored, do not subtract its glory from its skills. Reaction: After an opponent breaks one of your provinces, choose and discard a card from your hand - ready and honor this character.

card.name: Aspiring Challenger
card.property: Composure - This character gets +2 glory. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel. Honor the duel's winner.

card.name: Seppun Hidden Guard
card.property: Interrupt: When the effects of a character ability that targets a unique character you control would initiate, sacrifice this character - cancel those effects. The player who initiated that ability discards 1 random card from his or her hand.

card.name: Humble Magistrate
card.property: Seeker role only. While this character is attacking, each character with printed cost 4 or higher does not count its skill towards the resolution of this conflict.

card.name: Righteous Magistrate
card.property: Keeper role only. While this character is defending, players cannot gain or lose honor.

card.name: Akodo Toturi
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which this character is participating, if you have the Imperial Favor - each player cannot play cards from his or her hand until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Hantei XXXVIII
card.property: No attachments. If an opponent has the Imperial Favor, discard this character. Action: During a conflict, choose a participating character - bow that character. Interrupt: When an opponent triggers an ability that chooses 1 or more targets - you choose those targets instead.

card.name: Miya Library
card.property: Limit 1 per deck. Action: Look at the top 4 cards of your dynasty deck. You may choose an Imperial character from among them and switch it with this card (faceup). Put the cards back on top in any order.

card.name: Proving Ground
card.property: Reaction: After a character you control wins a duel - draw 1 card. (Limit twice per round.)

card.name: Guardian of Virtue
card.property: Air role only. Composure - This character does not bow as a result of conflict resolution in conflicts in which it is defending. (You have composure if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's.)

card.name: Honed Nodachi
card.property: Attach to a Bushi character. Restricted. Reaction: After attached character wins a [Military] conflict, remove 1 fate from attached character. You opponent chooses a participating character he or she controls - discard that character.

card.name: Smuggling Deal
card.property: Action: Give an opponent 1 honor and choose an ability on a character you control - you may trigger that ability an additional time this round (or specified period).

card.name: In Defense of Rokugan
card.property: Action: During a conflict, sacrifice a (friendly) defending character and choose an attacking character - set the attacking character's [Military] skill to 0 until the end of the conflict.

card.name: Iaijutsu Master
card.property: Attach to a Duelist character. Reaction: After honor dials are revealed during a duel in which attached character is participating - increase or decrease the value of your bid by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

card.name: Storied Defeat
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a character that has lost a duel during this conflict - bow that character. You may spend 1 fate to dishonor that character.

card.name: Try Again Tomorrow
card.property: Action: During a conflict in which you control a participating honored Courtier character, choose an attacking character - move that character home.

card.name: Civil Discourse
card.property: Earth role only. Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Political] duel against a character your opponent controls of his or her choice – resolve the duel. Until the end of the conflict, the duel’s loser gains: "Increase the cost to play each card in your hand by 1."

card.name: Solitary Strength
card.property: Air role only. If attached character is participating in a conflict with 1 or more other characters you control, discard this attachment. Reaction: After attached character wins a conflict – gain 1 honor.

card.name: Mirumoto Daishō
card.property: Restricted. Attached character may not have other restricted attachments. While attached character is dueling, your opponent cannot bid 1 or 5.

card.name: Magnificent Triumph
card.property: Action: During a conflict, choose a character that has won a duel during this conflict - until the end of the conflict, that character gets +2[Military], +2[Political], and cannot be chosen as the target of opponent's events.

card.name: Karmic Balance
card.property: Play only if your honor bid is equal to an opponent's. Action: Each player shuffles his or her hand and conflict discard pile into his or her conflict deck and draws 4 cards. Remove this card from the game.

card.name: True Strike Kenjutsu
card.property: Attached character gains: "Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel, using each character's base [Military] instead of their total [Military] skill for this duel. Bow the duel's loser."

card.name: Hand to Hand
card.property: Action: During a [Military] conflict, choose an attachment on a participating character - discard that attachment. Then, your opponent may resolve this ability.

card.name: The Fires of Justice
card.property: Void Role only. Reaction: After you win a [Military] conflict, your opponent chooses a participating character he or she controls. Select one - remove all fate from that character, or move any amount of fate from your opponent's fate pool onto that character.

card.name: Glorious Victory
card.property: Reaction: After you break a province during a [Military] conflict – honor each character you control.

card.name: Unmatched Expertise
card.property: Fire role only. Attached character cannot receive dishonored status tokens. Forced Reaction: After attached character loses a conflict - discard this attachment. Errata from RRG v11

card.name: Gift of Amaterasu
card.property: Reaction: After you win a conflict by 5 or more skill, choose a character you control – honor that character.

card.name: Severed from the Stream
card.property: Action: Perform a glory count. The player who loses the glory count returns all rings in his or her claimed ring pool to the unclaimed ring pool.

card.name: Subdue the Spirits
card.property: Action: During a conflict, if you are more honorable than your opponent - until the end of the conflict, each participating character you control adds its glory to each of its skills. (This applies in addition to any modifiers to the skills of those characters due to being honored or dishonored.)

card.name: Infiltrator's Tools
card.property: Attach to a Shinobi character. Attached character gains covert. (When this character attacks, choose one character without covert. That character cannot be declared as a defender.)

card.name: Kirei-ko
card.property: Reaction: After a character your opponent controls triggers an ability - bow that character.

card.name: Unmask
card.property: Void role only. Action: During a conflict, if the bid on your honor dial is higher than your opponent’s, choose a participating character – discard that character’s status token and set its skills to their printed values until the end of the conflict. Its controller gains 2 honor.

card.name: Miyako's Undertaking
card.property: Play only if you have 6 or fewer honor. Action: During a conflict, choose a non-unique character in your opponent's dynasty discard pile and a participating character you control - until the end of the conflict, your character becomes a copy of the character in your opponent's discard pile.

card.name: Shinjo Ambusher
card.property: Reaction: After you play this character into a conflict - the attacked province cannot trigger its abilities this conflict.

card.name: Jewel of the Khamasin
card.property: Action: While attached character is attacking, lose 1 honor - reduce the attacked province's province strength by 1 until the end of the conflict (to a minimum of 0). (Unlimited.)

card.name: Challenge on the Fields
card.property: Action: During a conflict, initiate a [Military] duel - resolve the duel, giving each dueling character +1[Military] for each other participating character controlled by the same player until the end of the duel. Move the duel's loser home.

card.name: Leniency
card.property: Air role only. Interrupt: When you would resolve a ring effect, choose a character with printed cost 2 or lower in your provinces – instead of resolving the ring effect, put that character into play.

card.name: Kujira's Hireling
card.property: Action: Spend 1 fate and select one - this character gets +1[Military] and +1[Political] until the end of the phase, or this character gets -1[Military] and -1[Political] until the end of the phase. Any player may trigger this ability. (Unlimited.) Card design by 2017 World Champion Samuel Benies.

card.name: Unveiled Destiny
card.property: Seeker role only. While attached character is attacking, the contested ring gains the element of your role. (If attached character wins the conflict as an attacker, you may choose which of its ring effects to resolve.)

card.name: Defend Your Honor
card.property: Keeper role only. Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate during a conflict, initate a [Military] duel against a character your opponent controls of his or her choice - resolve the duel. If your character is the duel's winner, cancel those effects.

card.name: Stay Your Hand
card.property: Interrupt: When a duel that targets a character you control would resolve - cancel the duel. Errata from RRG v2.0

card.name: Warm Welcome
card.property: Play only if your honor bid is lower than an opponent's. Action: Choose a card in your conflict discard pile - play that card as if it were in your hand. If that card is an event, put it on the bottom of your conflict deck.

card.name: Prayers to Ebisu
card.property: Action: Each player with 19 or more honor loses 4 honor. Each player with 6 or fewer honor gains 4 honor. Draw 1 card.
